nodes.text: The Armored Krakkiss was a giant, beige-colored armadillo-like creature native to Tatooine. It had thick plating covering its body, and its only vulnerable part was its head. It attacked its prey by rolling like a ball towards the enemy or by swinging its tail against the opponent, or trying to use the environment against it.
In 32 BBY, two Jedi dueled an Armored Krakkiss.
The Armored Krakkiss appears in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I Jedi Power Battles.
